item.description:
I am a PhD candidate at Dyson Robotics Lab at Imperial College London. I am supervised by Dr. Leutenegger. Before that I earned my M.Sc. in Artificial Intelligence and Robotics at La Sapienza in Rome and did my undergrad in Computer Engineering at Roma Tre in Rome.

My research interest is at the intersection between 3D Reconstruction and Deep Learning. I am currently exploring how to augment traditional 3D reconstruction and mapping algorithm with Deep Learning.

Whenever I am not at my desk I spend time climbing and camping around rainy UK.
